original_title: カリスマ読者モデル史上最悪の恥辱 愛波りりか
overview: "Ririka", who is active as a charismatic reader model for magazines, has a cheeky attitude that has earned the antipathy of the staff around her. One day, "Ririka" introduced her fraudulent products on her own SNS, and her consumers flooded the magazine company with complaints. She does a lot of damage. The staff who tremble with her anger decided to make "Ririka" compensate for her loss with her body.
title: The Greatest Shame of All Time: Ririka Ainami
